For those wondering how to to change the "RELOADED" user name in the game, this is how you do it:

1. Download this: http://www.bpsoft.com/downloads/.

2. Open up steam_api.dll in the game folder.

3. Go to Edit > Replace.

4. Plug "*!RELOADED!* into the find field.

5. Enter your name into the replace field.

6. Select "pad with nulls."

7. Do not change anything else.

8. Click OK, then replace. You only have to change one string.

9. Play the game.

@gws - Thanks gws, chaning the name works perfectly :) Here is my version for those who'd like to use a free Hex Editor

1. Download this: HXD Free Hex Editor
http://mh-nexus.de/en/hxd/

2. Backup the Reloaded steam_api.dll

3. Open up steam_api.dll in the game folder.

4. Go to Search.

5. Look for *!RELOADED!* into the find field.

6. type in your name, notice that on the left those Hexes (random looking number) have to all filled up with something, therefore enter your name and then spaces e.g. nik and several space to fill up the place. Remember all characters should come up to 12. As *!RELOADED!* has 12 characters and you are replacing it.

7. If you've done everyhting right, save the file. If get "File size has changed" means your character count isn't right!
